itemDescription: British aristocrat; first wife of George Spencer-Churchill, 8th Duke of Marlborough (1847-1932)

wikipedia_page.main: Albertha Frances Anne Spencer-Churchill, Duchess of Marlborough, VA (29 July 1847 – 7 January 1932) was an English aristocrat.

response: * Albertha Spencer-Churchill, Duchess of Marlborough (née Hamilton, 1847-1932), first wife of the 8th Duke
